main.name: Brian Spencer
main.description: I live to create experiences in React
main.bio: Hi there! My name is Brian Spencer! I've been coding for over a year and specialize in using React JS and Next JS for developing experiences. As a React developer I've worked on both website clones using the React stack, and vanilla JS projects to build & scale them to completion. Along my journey I realized my passion existed in creating digital experiences for others. With this passion, I have now trained myself to develop real world usable code by reading documentation, getting coaching sessions through my mentor and by progressing through coding bootcamps.

work.title: Staff Accountant
work.description: Managed a portfolio of 45 clients with a focus in fund accounting and the month end closing of balance sheet and income statement accounts.

projects.title: Medium Blog Clone (React JS & Sanity CMS)

testimonials.text: Brian is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Brian has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
